articles.title: Hit by high inflation, more people turn to GoFundMe to pay for gasoline, groceries and baby formula
articles.content: A donation was made once every second on GoFundMe this year, according to the crowdfunding site’s year-end report.

articles.title: Apple, AMD confirm they're among TSMC’s first Arizona customers, while Intel preps for return to cutting edge in 2023
articles.content: Apple Inc. Chief Executive Tim Cook confirmed at an event Tuesday that the tech giant will be one of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.'s first Arizona fab customers, while Intel Corp. hopes to join TSMC on the cutting edge of chip making by the end of 2023.

articles.title: Why Meta Platforms Stock Dove Today
articles.content: Several news items weighed on the tech giant.

articles.title: Biden touts TSMC's ramped-up investment in Arizona chip manufacturing: 'It could be a game changer'
articles.content: President Biden talks up Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.'s plan to lift its investment in Arizona manufacturing to $40 billion from $12 billion.

articles.title: Why Apple, Salesforce, and Qualcomm Stocks Are Volatile Today
articles.content: Stocks fell as investors feared that the Fed will tip the economy into a recession.

articles.title: EU ruling could ‘kneecap’ Meta’s digital ad revenue: report
articles.content: EU privacy officials ruled Facebook's parent company should not require users to agree to personalized ads based on their online activity, according to a report in the Wall Street Journal.

articles.title: Microsoft invested $1 billion in an AI system that helped me write this column. See what it had to say about Tesla.
articles.content: OpenAI's ChatGPT helped me crunch numbers as an investor.

articles.title: Meta Platforms (META) Adds Age Verification to Facebook Dating
articles.content: Meta Platforms (META) introduces age verification to Facebook dating U.S. to protect children from unwanted attention.

articles.title: $3,000 gold and more outrageous market predictions investors shouldn't brush aside.
articles.content: Expect the unexpected was how 2022 rolled. Saxo Bank has a few wild ideas for 2023 that investors should  pay attention to.

articles.title: Here is What to Know Beyond Why Apple Inc. (AAPL) is a Trending Stock
articles.content: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Apple (AAPL). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.
